metadata.title: CVE-2022-44011 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in ClickHouse before 22.9.1.2603. An authenticateduser (with the ability to load data) could cause a heap buffer overflow andcrash the server by inserting a malformed CapnProto object. The fixedversions are 22.9.1.2603, 22.8.2.11, 22.7.4.16, 22.6.6.16, and 22.3.12.19.

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
